scripts.babel: npm run babel:lib && npm run babel:app
scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:html && npm run build:pack
scripts.build:compile: npm run clean:build && npm run compile
scripts.build:pack: npm run test && npm run webpack
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:build && && npm run clean:dist
scripts.clean:build: rimraf build/* && mkdir build/app && mkdir build/lib
scripts.clean:map: npm run clean:map:js && npm run clean:map:ts
scripts.clean:src: npm run clean:js && npm run clean:ts && npm run clean:map
scripts.compile: npm run babel && npm run tsc
scripts.dist: npm run clean:dist && npm run dist:app && npm run dist:html
scripts.dist:app: cpy build/app/*.bundle.js dist/app/ && ncp vendor dist/vendor
scripts.install: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.jshint: npm run lint:app && npm run lint:lib
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:lib && npm run tsc:app
